Interface IEnsembleComponentInformer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IRuntime
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Runtime

    public interface IEnsembleComponentInformer
    Interface declaring functionality delivering information about available components and ensembles.
    Author:
    Michal Kit
